description: [``botocore``] This release adds support for batch transcription in six new languages - Afrikaans, Danish, Mandarin Chinese (Taiwan), New Zealand English, South African English, and Thai.
[``botocore``] This release added new attributes to Rekognition RecognizeCelebities and GetCelebrityInfo API operations.
[``botocore``] Support added for resizing VPC prefix lists

[``botocore``] Adds support for 1) the AWS Graviton (AWS_ARM64) recommendation preference for Amazon EC2 instance and Auto Scaling group recommendations, and 2) the ability to get the enrollment statuses for all member accounts of an organization.
